lore: Zonte convinced his teacher Ainsworth not to give the order to exterminate the Slimes, as they were relatively harmless.\n\nAt night, the Paranormal Slime slides inside a bedroom and gets close to a bed. There, it lights a candle and makes some noise. When the victims awake, they watch in horror as this creature waves its hands and tongue. Finally, the Paranormal Slime lets out a laugh and stumbles out of the house.
menagerieDialog: (It has an extremely punchable expression on its face.)
(This creature has such a goofy face that even your normally-stoic personality is no match for the temptation to knock it flat on its slimy ass.)
(For some reason, you find its undeterrable happiness to be quite obnoxious.)
(It's nibbiling at random bits of dust and debris off the floor. You should really find it some decent food to eat.)
name: Paranormal Slime
